name: Baikonur Space (itch)
description:
Feel like an astronaut. On your rocket, you can fly into deep space to meet new sensations. But to do this, you will need to improve your spacecraft and spend a lot of training. So try to collect as much fuel as possible. It will be used to access drawings for improving the rocket.

Use them in the extended menu to improve the characteristics of the rocket: fuel tank capacity, speed increase, weight and maneuverability. This will make your rocket the most powerful and fastest. Go to the stars!)
